typical_symptoms_json: ["chest pain","shortness of breath","sweating","nausea","left arm pain","jaw pain"]
red_flag_symptoms_json: ["severe chest pain radiating to left arm","acute shortness of breath","diaphoresis"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Troponin elevation","ECG changes (ST elevation or depression)","Chest pain >20 minutes"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["ST elevation on ECG","Positive cardiac biomarkers","Radiation to left arm/jaw"]
evidence_sources_json: ["American Heart Association Guidelines","ESC Guidelines on Myocardial Infarction"]

red_flag_symptoms_json: ["sudden severe headache (thunderclap)","fever with headache","focal neurological deficits"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["At least 5 attacks","Headache lasting 4-72 hours","Unilateral, pulsating pain","Nausea or photophobia/phonophobia"]
recommended_tests_json: ["Clinical diagnosis","MRI brain if atypical","CT head to rule out bleeding"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["Visual aura preceding headache","Unilateral pulsating pain","Worse with activity"]
evidence_sources_json: ["International Headache Society Classification","American Academy of Neurology Guidelines"]

rare_symptoms_json: ["clubbing of fingers","superior vena cava syndrome","Horner syndrome"]
red_flag_symptoms_json: ["hemoptysis","unexplained weight loss >10 pounds","persistent cough >3 weeks in smoker"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Imaging showing mass","Biopsy confirmation","Smoking history or exposure"]
recommended_tests_json: ["Chest X-ray","CT chest with contrast","PET scan","Bronchoscopy with biopsy","Sputum cytology"]
evidence_sources_json: ["NCCN Guidelines","American Cancer Society","Lung Cancer Screening Trials"]

typical_symptoms_json: ["joint pain","morning stiffness","symmetric polyarthritis","hand and wrist swelling","fatigue"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Morning stiffness >1 hour","Arthritis of 3+ joints","Symmetric arthritis","Positive RF or anti-CCP"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["Symmetric small joint involvement","Morning stiffness","Positive anti-CCP","Erosions on X-ray"]

typical_symptoms_json: ["increased thirst","frequent urination","unexplained weight loss","fatigue","blurred vision","slow wound healing"]
red_flag_symptoms_json: ["diabetic ketoacidosis symptoms","severe hyperglycemia >600 mg/dL","altered mental status"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Fasting glucose ≥126 mg/dL","HbA1c ≥6.5%","Random glucose ≥200 mg/dL with symptoms"]
recommended_tests_json: ["Fasting blood glucose","HbA1c","Oral glucose tolerance test","Lipid panel","Urinalysis","Creatinine"]
evidence_sources_json: ["ADA Standards of Medical Care","WHO Diabetes Diagnostic Criteria"]

typical_symptoms_json: ["right lower quadrant pain","nausea","vomiting","fever","loss of appetite","rebound tenderness"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["RLQ pain with migration from periumbilical","Fever","Leukocytosis","CT showing appendiceal inflammation"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["McBurney point tenderness","Rovsing sign","Psoas sign","Migration of pain to RLQ"]
evidence_sources_json: ["American College of Surgeons Guidelines","Emergency Medicine Literature"]

red_flag_symptoms_json: ["status asthmaticus","severe respiratory distress","inability to speak full sentences","cyanosis"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Reversible airway obstruction on spirometry","FEV1 improvement >12% with bronchodilator","Peak flow variability"]
recommended_tests_json: ["Spirometry","Peak flow measurement","Methacholine challenge test","Allergy testing","Chest X-ray"]

typical_symptoms_json: ["dyspnea on exertion","orthopnea","paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea","leg swelling","fatigue","weight gain"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Clinical symptoms","BNP or NT-proBNP elevation","Echocardiogram showing reduced EF or diastolic dysfunction"]
evidence_sources_json: ["ACC/AHA Heart Failure Guidelines","ESC Heart Failure Guidelines"]

distinguishing_features_json: ["Elevated TSH with low Free T4","Cold intolerance","Weight gain despite no change in diet"]
evidence_sources_json: ["American Thyroid Association Guidelines","Endocrine Society Clinical Practice Guidelines"]

typical_symptoms_json: ["progressive memory loss","confusion","difficulty with daily tasks","language problems","mood changes","personality changes"]
red_flag_symptoms_json: ["rapidly progressive dementia","focal neurological signs","age <60 with dementia"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Gradual onset cognitive decline","Impairment in ≥2 cognitive domains","MRI showing cortical atrophy","Neuropsychological testing"]
differential_diagnoses_json: ["Vascular Dementia","Lewy Body Dementia","Frontotemporal Dementia","Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus","Depression"]
recommended_tests_json: ["MRI brain","Neuropsychological testing","MMSE or MoCA","TSH","B12","RPR","PET scan (if available)"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["Insidious onset","Gradual progression","Predominant memory impairment","Medial temporal lobe atrophy on MRI"]

typical_symptoms_json: ["sudden weakness","facial drooping","speech difficulty","confusion","vision changes","severe headache","loss of coordination"]
diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Focal neurological deficit","Sudden onset","CT or MRI showing infarct","Vascular risk factors"]
recommended_tests_json: ["CT head non-contrast (immediate)","MRI brain with DWI","CT angiography","ECG","Carotid ultrasound","Echocardiogram"]

diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Fever or hypothermia","Respiratory symptoms","Infiltrate on chest imaging","Leukocytosis or leukopenia"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["Focal consolidation on CXR","Fever with productive cough","Pleuritic chest pain"]

red_flag_symptoms_json: ["fever with flank pain (pyelonephritis)","sepsis","altered mental status in elderly"]
evidence_sources_json: ["IDSA UTI Guidelines","European Association of Urology Guidelines"]

diagnostic_criteria_json: ["SIRS criteria (2+)","Suspected or confirmed infection","Organ dysfunction (qSOFA ≥2)","Lactate elevation"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["Hypotension requiring vasopressors","Lactate >2 mmol/L","Source of infection identified"]

diagnostic_criteria_json: ["Clinical suspicion with risk factors","D-dimer elevation","CT pulmonary angiography showing clot"]
distinguishing_features_json: ["Sudden onset dyspnea","Risk factors (DVT, surgery, immobility)","Pleuritic chest pain"]
evidence_sources_json: ["ESC Pulmonary Embolism Guidelines","ACCP Antithrombotic Therapy Guidelines"]
